about_slogan.description: Taking BBO to the next level

alert_1NT_15_17.description: Within ACBL-land, 1NT without an explanation is assumed to be 15-17 HCP. In wider circles, you should always indicate your notrump range and style, e.g. “15-17 HCP, stiff Q, K, A permitted.”
alert_1NT_15_17.message: 在ACBL的比赛中，不提示的1NT应当是15-17HCP，但在更广泛的比赛中，你需要提示1NT点力范围和包括Q，K，A单张

alert_auto_alert_occurs.description: When an auto alert occurs, the user is notified by a brief popup. Owing to limitations on how well BBO Helper can integrate with the BBO application, the auto alert will not otherwise show up on your screen. Nonetheless, it is communicated to your opponents, shows up in the History pane later, and is otherwise be included in the permanent record of the hand. If an auto alert is incorrect, you may change it by providing an explanation in the usual manner.
alert_auto_alert_occurs.message: 如果有自动提示显示，使用者将会看到一个短暂弹窗。

alert_define_your_alerts.description: Define your automatic alerts. If a text box below is left empty, no auto alert will be made. Use the standard BBO !c, !d, !h, !s notations for the club, diamond, heart, and spade suit symbols respectively. These will be replaced with $CDH_HTML$, and $S_HTML$. For example, “!c+!d 5-5 or better”, will be alerted as, “♣+♦, 5-5 or better”. BBO limits alerts to 39 characters.
alert_define_your_alerts.message: 解释你的自动提示。如果解释框空白，自动提示将不会显示。采用BBO标准!c, !d, !h, !s符号。

alert_full_disclosure.description: Auto Alerts simplify full disclosure. Please take advantage of this functionality. For example, if you systematically have 4+ diamonds when you open 1$D_HTML$ except when you have 4=4=3=2 shape, indicate this with, “4+ cd, unless 4=4=3=2”.

alert_precision.description: Precision players should indicate that 1$H_HTML$ and 1$S_HTML$ are limited bids (“10-15 HCP” or as appropriate), in addition to providing information for the 1$C_HTML$, $D_HTML$, 1NT, and 2$C_HTML$ openings. In an ACBL open regional pairs or higher events, it is reasonable to assume opponents have a basic familiarity with Precision. This is not a reasonable assumption in Support Your Club games on BBO. Disclose.
alert_precision.message: 在ACBL区域性或更高级的比赛中，牌手们或许对精确体系比较熟悉，但在BBO上，除了1$C_HTML$, $D_HTML$, 1NT, and 2$C_HTML$要说明以外，精确体系还应该提示1$H_HTML$ and 1$S_HTML$为限制性叫牌（“10-15HCP”或相当）

alert_remember_save.description: Remember to save any changes before closing this window.
alert_remember_save.message: 关闭窗口前存档所有改编

alert_section_nt_defense.description: Direct seat defense to a 1NT opening

appDesc.description: Adds functionally to Bridge Base Online (BBO) website

board_copy_failed.description: Board HTML copy to clipboard failed.

board_copy_text.description: Board HTML copied to clipboard as text

download_in_progress.description: A download is already in progress.

fetching_LIN.description: Fetching LIN records for each board

install_chrome_refresh_tab.description: If you have a BBO application tab open, %1 will not fully function until you either refresh (press F5 or click the %2 button on the address bar) or close and reopen the BBO application tab. Any of these actions will log you off BBO.
install_chrome_refresh_tab.message: 如果您打开了 BBO 应用程序选项卡，则 %1 将无法完全运行，直到您刷新（F5 或单击地址栏上的 %2 按钮）或关闭并重新打开 BBO 应用程序选项卡。 任何这些操作都会让您退出 BBO

install_close.description: You may simply close this message and continue to use BBO normally until you are ready to close the BBO application tab.
install_close.message: 您可以简单地关闭此消息并继续正常使用 BBO，直到您准备好关闭 BBO 应用程序选项卡

install_refresh_tab.description: %1 may not function correctly until you refresh or close and reopen the BBO application tab. Either action will log you off BBO.
install_refresh_tab.message: %1 有可能无法正常工作。请刷新或重起BBO，这会需要重新登录

install_update.description: %1 has been automatically updated to version %2.

no_ACBL_players.description: No known ACBL players for field strength estimation
no_ACBL_players.message: 在牌手水平估算中没有ACBL牌手

no_EBU_players.description: No known EBU players for field strength estimation
no_EBU_players.message: 在牌手水平估算中没有EBU牌手

options_appAutoAlerts.message: 启动自动提示（另外编辑提示）

options_appAutoAlertsFlag.message: 将 [B++] 添加到所动自动提示

options_appBoardLocalization.description: Use local language for board display rather than English
options_appBoardLocalization.message: 采用当地语言替代英语显示牌

options_appChatAutoSuits.description: Automatically insert ! for cards, bids, and suits in chat window
options_appChatAutoSuits.message: 在对话框中自动插入牌张，叫牌和花色

options_appChatNameSubs.description: Enable !w, !n, !e, and !t name substitutions in chat window
options_appChatNameSubs.message: 在对话框中启动!w, !n, !e, and !t名字替代

options_appClaimAutoSuits.description: Automatically insert ! for cards, bids, and suits in claim window
options_appClaimAutoSuits.message: 在宣称框中自动显示牌张，叫牌和花色

options_appDoubleDummyMode.description: Show double dummy table, par, and par contract(s) in History pane
options_appDoubleDummyMode.message: 在历史一栏中显示双明手栏和最佳定约

options_appDoubleDummyTricks.description: Double dummy table shows tricks instead of contracts

options_appShowAuctionClock.description: Show time taken for last call in lower right corner of the auction box
options_appShowAuctionClock.message: 在左下角显示最后一次叫牌时间长度

options_appShowPeopleTooltip.description: Show real name tooltip in People tab (friends, hosts, stars, ignores)

options_appShowPlayClock.description: Show time required to play each card in trick
options_appShowPlayClock.message: 显示打每张牌需要的时间

options_appTrafficLogFeed.description: Include <sc_feed> messages (friend logins, VuGraph announcements, etc)
options_appTrafficLogFeed.message: 包括<sc_feed>信息（好友登录，转播公告等等）

options_appTrafficLogHidePassword.description: Replace BBO password with 8 asterisks (best if sharing traffic logs)

options_appTrafficLogging.description: Enable web request and websocket traffic logging

options_appTrafficLoggingFull.description: Log everything, including pings, keepalives, and lang.php request
options_appTrafficLoggingFull.message: 记录所有信息包括网址查询，保持连接和语言要求

options_appTrafficMaxKilobytes.message: 登录次数限制，0表示没有限制

options_auctionBBOstyling.description: Style the auction box similar to BBO

options_auctionHideFinalPasses.description: Don't include the final three passes (more compact display)

options_auctionSeatLetters.description: Use seat letters (S, W, N, E) instead of seat names
options_auctionSeatLetters.message: 用(S, W, N, E) 表示座位

options_auctionShortCalls.description: Use short calls (P, X, XX) instead of Pass, Dbl, and Rdbl
options_auctionShortCalls.message: 用缩写(P, X, XX) 代替Pass，DBL，和RDBL

options_auctionTextNT.description: Use NT instead N for notrump bids

options_boardIncludeBorder.description: Include bounding box (one pixel grey border)

options_boardIncludeNames.description: Include player handles / seat names. Use:

options_boardLinksTargetBlank.description: Links open in a new page $TARGET$

options_boardShowDateTime.description: Include date and time of event (if available)
options_boardShowDateTime.message: 如果可能包括活动时间

options_boardShowDoubleDummy.description: Include double dummy table, par, and par contract(s)
options_boardShowDoubleDummy.message: 包括双明手框和双方最佳定约

options_boardShowExplanations.description: Include explanations of any explained bids (if any)

options_boardShowLinks.description: Include BBO Viewer and Bridge Solver links

options_boardShowPlay.description: Include table of card play (if available)

options_boardShowTiming.description: Show timing (if available) in auction box and card play table
options_boardShowTiming.message: 如果可能，在叫牌框和牌桌上显示时间

options_cardUse10.description: Use 10 instead of T for displaying tens.

options_hvDoubleDummyMode.description: Show double dummy table etc in standalone BBO Hand Viewer
options_hvDoubleDummyMode.message: 在单独的牌例回看窗口中显示双明手

options_sessDoubleDummyAlways.description: Always include double dummy table in session HTML (even if not cached)

options_suitForceBlack.description:
Explicitly set color of spades and clubs to black in HTML output. If not
checked, color will match foreground color of embedding document
options_suitForceBlack.message: 在HTML输出时明确设置黑桃和梅花为黑色，如果没有选择黑色，其颜色将和前置文件相同

options_suitFourColor.description: Use four colors for the suits (the colors are similar to bidding box colors)
options_suitFourColor.message: 用四种颜色表示各套（和叫牌框显示一样）

options_travSuitFourColor.description: Use four colors for the suits in the traveller display

qs_appChatAutoSuits.message: 启动自动对话花色符号

qs_showddHV.message: 在牌例回看中显示双明手栏

session_apply_to_user.description: Raw scores and matchpoint percentage or IMP scores apply to user %1 and partner.
session_apply_to_user.message: 原始比分和比赛得分比或IMP得分适用于%1和搭档

session_no_double_dummy.description: No double dummy data was cached for any boards. To see double dummy results, enable the %1 option in the full settings of %2 and download the session again.
session_no_double_dummy.message: 任何牌都没有四明手数据，需要查看四明手数据时，请在BBO帮助设置中打开%1选项，然后下载

session_no_timing.description: No timing information was available for any boards.
session_no_timing.message: 对任何一副牌都没有时间信息

session_unable_lin.description: Unable to download LIN string from BBO for %1 boards.

update_chrome_refresh_tab.description: If you have a BBO application tab open, the updated %1 will not take effect until you either refresh (F5 or click the %2 button on the address bar) or close and reopen the BBO application tab. Any of these actions will log you off BBO.
update_chrome_refresh_tab.message: 如果您打开了 BBO 应用程序选项卡，则 %1 将无法完全运行，直到您刷新（F5 或单击地址栏上的 %2 按钮）或关闭并重新打开 BBO 应用程序选项卡。 这些操作中的任何一个都会让您退出 BBO
